mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cart ( uid, gid, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{gid}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cart SET num=#{num}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE cid=#{cid}
mapper.select: SELECT cid, num FROM t_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} AND gid=#{gid}
SELECT uid, num FROM t_cart WHERE cid=#{cid}
SELECT cid, uid, gid, title, price, image, t_cart.num FROM t_cart LEFT JOIN t_goods ON t_cart.gid=t_goods.id WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY t_cart.created_time DESC
